title: Is there any point in skill + flash?
body:
Do lcs guys not use it bc its too hard or bc its too shit?
So now that ive posted this...you might as well just post an animation cancel you know of each

replies.body:
Ori - Ball self + Ult + Flash
Ahri - Charm + Flash
Riven - 3rd Q + Flash
Vayne - Condemn + Flash
Lee - Ult + Flash

Can Ori flash with the ball on herself during her ult and have it hit, or is it like the rest that are ordered the wrong way?

Ahri using flash for charm's is pretty bad btw, she has an ult which is a free flash that does damage for a similar situation.
are you simple? You Charm flash because it's almost instant and they cant react to it. If you ult they can use their dash/flash etc.

Because LCS players realize that blowing a flash on something offensive when it can be used to keep you alive is a bad idea, and because 400G on the enemy team means more then 400G on them cause they play TEAM games.
Well that is just wrong and you are proven wrong each and every week, do you even watch competitive play?
and I thought I was doing something wrong by only using flash for defense >.<
it all depends on the champ. q-flash on vi can secure a kill, which leads to a tower, which leads to a dragon/barron.

LCS Pros use ability+flash all the time.

Gnar Ultimates, Jarvan E+Q+Flash, Vi Q+Flash, Lee Sin Insecs..
It can catch people off guard, or just add a bit of range to a spell.
